content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Hello Aziz, it's great to meet you. Thank you for considering my apartment. Based on my understanding of the market and the size of the apartment, I believe a rental price of 600 Euros per month would be reasonable. However, I am open to negotiation. What do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I think the rental price of 600 Euros per month is a bit high. Can we negotiate?

I am a student and I want to rent the apartment for the lowest possible price. I am responsible and dependable, so I believe I would be a good tenant for your apartment.

I am willing to pay 500 Euros per month for the rental price. Can we agree on that amount?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Aziz, I understand that you are a student and you are looking for a lower rental price. While 500 Euros per month may be lower than my initial offer, it would still require a significant financial commitment on your part. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I am not willing to accept a rental price of 500 Euros per month.

However, I am willing to consider a rental price of 550 Euros per month. This price would still provide me with a reasonable return on my investment, while also taking into account your financial situation as a student.

What do you think about this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 550 Euros per month.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me. I am confident that I will be a good tenant for your apartment.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to moving in.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Hello Aziz, I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price of 550 Euros per month. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate and I'm glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us.

I'm glad to hear that you are a responsible and dependable tenant, and I have no doubt that you will take good care of my apartment. I look forward to welcoming you as my new tenant.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.
name: Heinrich Heine
